name: Medless (Global Game Jam 2022)
description:
You are a thief with the ability to change between realms.

Go into the castle and steal the magic orb to ponder it!

This game is a part of EUAS Global Game Jam 2022

This game is made in circa 48 hours so mistakes were made.

Credits:
